Introductory Problems

Weird Algorithm 
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
void build(ll a[],ll st[],ll v,ll stl,ll str)
{
    if(stl==str)
        st[v]=a[stl];
    else
    {
        ll stm=(stl+str)/2;
        build(a,st,2*v,stl,stm);
        build(a,st,2*v+1,stm+1,str);
        st[v]=min(st[2*v],st[2*v+1]);
    }
}
ll ans(ll st[],ll v,ll stl,ll str,ll l,ll r)
{
    if(l>r)
        return INT_MAX;
    if(l==stl&&r==str)
        return st[v];
    else
    {
        ll stm=(stl+str)/2;
        return min(ans(st,2*v,stl,stm,l,min(r,stm)),ans(st,2*v+1,stm+1,str,max(stm+1,l),r));
    }
}
void upd(ll st[],ll v,ll stl,ll str,ll pos,ll val)
{
    if(stl==str)
        st[v]=val;
    else
    {
        ll stm=stl+str;
        stm/=2;
        if(pos<=stm)
            upd(st,2*v,stl,stm,pos,val);
        else
            upd(st,2*v+1,stm+1,str,pos,val);
        st[v]=min(st[2*v],st[2*v+1]);
    }
}
int main()
{
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(NULL);
    ll n;
    cin>>n;
    while(n!=1)
    {
     cout<<n<<" ";
     if(n%2){
       n*=3;
       n++;
      }
     else
        n/=2;
 }
 cout<<1;
    return 0;
}

{
  checkpoint1();

 cin>>n;
 ll ans=0;
 for(ll i=1;i<=n;i++)
    ans^=i;
 for(ll i=0;i<n-1;i++)

Repetitions 
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
void build(ll a[],ll st[],ll v,ll stl,ll str)
{
    if(stl==str)
        st[v]=a[stl];
    else
    {
        ll stm=(stl+str)/2;
        build(a,st,2*v,stl,stm);
        build(a,st,2*v+1,stm+1,str);
        st[v]=min(st[2*v],st[2*v+1]);
    }
}
ll ans(ll st[],ll v,ll stl,ll str,ll l,ll r)
{
    if(l>r)
        return INT_MAX;
    if(l==stl&&r==str)
        return st[v];
    else
    {
        ll stm=(stl+str)/2;
        return min(ans(st,2*v,stl,stm,l,min(r,stm)),ans(st,2*v+1,stm+1,str,max(stm+1,l),r));
    }
}
void upd(ll st[],ll v,ll stl,ll str,ll pos,ll val)
{
    if(stl==str)
        st[v]=val;
    else
    {
        ll stm=stl+str;
        stm/=2;
        if(pos<=stm)
            upd(st,2*v,stl,stm,pos,val);
        else
            upd(st,2*v+1,stm+1,str,pos,val);
        st[v]=min(st[2*v],st[2*v+1]);
    }
}
int main()
{
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(NULL);
    string s;
    cin>>s;
    ll n=s.length();
    ll temp=1,ans=0;
    for(ll i=1;i<n;i++)
    {
        if(s[i]==s[i-1])
            temp++;
        else
        {
            ans=max(temp,ans);
            temp=1;
        }
    }
    ans=max(ans,temp);
    cout<<ans;
    return 0;
}
Increasing Array 
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
#define mod 1000000007
void build(ll a[],ll st[],ll v,ll stl,ll str)
{
    if(stl==str)
        st[v]=a[stl];
    else
    {
        ll stm=(stl+str)/2;
        build(a,st,2*v,stl,stm);
        build(a,st,2*v+1,stm+1,str);
        st[v]=min(st[2*v],st[2*v+1]);
    }
}
ll ans(ll st[],ll v,ll stl,ll str,ll l,ll r)
{
    if(l>r)
        return INT_MAX;
    if(l==stl&&r==str)
        return st[v];
    else
    {
        ll stm=(stl+str)/2;
        return min(ans(st,2*v,stl,stm,l,min(r,stm)),ans(st,2*v+1,stm+1,str,max(stm+1,l),r));
    }
}
void upd(ll st[],ll v,ll stl,ll str,ll pos,ll val)
{
    if(stl==str)
        st[v]=val;
    else
    {
        ll stm=stl+str;
        stm/=2;
        if(pos<=stm)
            upd(st,2*v,stl,stm,pos,val);
        else
            upd(st,2*v+1,stm+1,str,pos,val);
        st[v]=min(st[2*v],st[2*v+1]);
    }
}
ll modi(ll a,ll b)
{
    ll res=1;
    while(b>0)
    {
        if(b&1)
        {
            res*=a;
            if(res>=mod)
                res%=mod;
        }
        a*=a;
        if(a>=mod)
            a%=mod;
        b>>=1;
    }
    return res;
}
int main()
{
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(NULL);
    ll n;
    cin>>n;
    ll a[n];
    for(ll i=0;i<n;i++)
        cin>>a[i];
    ll ans=0;
    for(ll i=1;i<n;i++)
    {
        if(a[i]-a[i-1]<0)
        {
            ans+=a[i-1]-a[i];
            a[i]=a[i-1];
        }
    }
    cout<<ans;
    return 0;
}

int main()
{
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(NULL);
    ll n;
    cin>>n;
    if(n==1)
        cout<<1;
    else if(n==4)
        cout<<"2 4 1 3";
    else if(n<4)
        cout<<"NO SOLUTION";
    else
    {
        for(ll i=1;i<=n;i+=2)
            cout<<i<<" ";
        for(ll i=2;i<=n;i+=2)
            cout<<i<<" ";
    }
    return 0;
}
Two Sets 
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
#define mod 1000000007
#define pb push_back
#define inf 1e18;
void checkpoint1()
{
 ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(NULL);
 /*#ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
    freopen("input.txt","r",stdin);
    freopen("output.txt","w",stdout);
  #endif
 */
}
int main()
{
  checkpoint1();
 
 ll n;
 cin>>n;
 ll op=(n*(n+1))/2;
  if(op%2)
   cout<<"NO";
 else
  {
   set< ll > p1;
    set< ll > p2;
    op/=2;
    ll i,sum=0;
   for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
   {
     sum+=i;
     p1.insert(i);
     if(sum>=op)
     {
       if(sum==op)
          break;
       else
        {
         p1.erase(sum-op);
         p2.insert(sum-op);
          break;
       }
     }
   }
   for(ll j=i+1;j<=n;j++)
      p2.insert(j);
   cout<<"YES\n"<<p1.size()<<"\n";
   for(auto i:p1)
      cout<<i<<" ";
   cout<<"\n"<<p2.size()<<"\n";
    for(auto i:p2)
      cout<<i<<" ";
 }
 return 0;
}

    ll res=1;

    {
        if(b&1)
        {
            res*=a;

int main()
{
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(NULL);
    ll n;
    cin>>n;
    ll ans=0,op=5,m=5;
    while(m<=n)
    {
        ans+=(n/m);
        m*=op;
    }
    cout<<ans;
    return 0;
}

{
  checkpoint1();
 
 ll t,a,b;
 cin>>t;
 while(t--)
 {
   cin>>a>>b;
    if(((a+b)%3==0)&&min(a,b)*2>=max(a,b))
      cout<<"YES";
    else
      cout<<"NO";

 }
 return 0;

Palindrome reorder 
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
#define mod 1000000007
#define pb push_back
#define inf 1e18;
void checkpoint1()
{
 ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(NULL);
 /*#ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
    freopen("input.txt","r",stdin);
    freopen("output.txt","w",stdout);
  #endif
 */
}
int main()
{
  checkpoint1();
 
 string s;
 cin>>s;
 string f="",l="",o="";
  ll n=s.length();
  map< char,ll > m;
  for(ll i=0;i<n;i++)
   m[s[i]]++;
  for(auto i:m)
 {
   if(i.second%2==1)
    {
     o+=(i.first);
     i.second--;
   }
   if((i.second%2==0)&&(i.second!=0))
   {
     for(ll j=0;j<i.second/2;j++)
      {
       f+=(i.first);
       l+=(i.first);
     }
   }
   if(o.length()>1)
    {
     cout<<"NO SOLUTION";
      return 0;
    }
 }
 reverse(l.begin(),l.end());
 f+=o;
 f+=l;
 cout<<f;
  return 0;
}
Tower of Hanoi 
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
vector<pair<int,int>> v;
void go(int n,int src,int des,int help)
{
 if(n==0)
   return;
  go(n-1,src,help,des);
 v.push_back({src,des});
 go(n-1,help,des,src);
}
int main()
{
  ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0);
 cin.tie(0);
 int n;
  cin>>n;
 go(n,1,3,2);
  cout<<v.size()<<"\n";
 for(auto i:v)
   cout<<i.first<<" "<<i.second<<"\n";
}

#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

        st[v]=min(st[2*v],st[2*v+1]);
    }
}

        return INT_MAX;
    if(l==stl&&r==str)
        return st[v];

}
void upd(ll st[],ll v,ll stl,ll str,ll pos,ll val)

ll modi(ll a,ll b)
{
    ll res=1;
    while(b>0)
    {
        if(b&1)
        {
            res*=a;
            if(res>=mod)
                res%=mod;

            a%=mod;

int main()
{
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(NULL);
    string s;
    cin>>s;
    vector< string > v;
    sort(s.begin(),s.end());
    v.pb(s);
    while(next_permutation(s.begin(),s.end()))
        v.pb(s);
    cout<<v.size()<<"\n";
    for(auto i:v)
        cout<<i<<"\n";
    return 0;
}
Apple Divisions 
//#pragma GCC optimize("Ofast")
//#pragma GCC target("avx,avx2,fma")
//#pragma GCC optimization ("unroll-loops")
 
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
 
#define ll long long
#define ld long double
#define mod 1000000007
#define pb push_back
#define inf 1000000000000000000
#define ff first
#define ss second
#define deb(x) cout<<#x<<" "<<x<<"\n"
#define Clear(x) memset(x,0,sizeof(x))
#define all(x) (x).begin(),(x).end()
 
void checkpoint1()
{
  /******think more code less******/
  ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
 cin.tie(NULL);
  cout.tie(NULL);
 /*#ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
    freopen("input.txt","r",stdin);
    freopen("output.txt","w",stdout);
  #endif*/
}
 
bool comp(pair< ll,ll > &a,pair< ll,ll > &b)
{
 if(a.ff!=b.ff)
   return a.ff<b.ff;
  else
  {
   if(a.ss>b.ss)
     return b.ss<a.ss;
    else if(a.ss<b.ss)
      return a.ss<b.ss;
  }
 return a.ff>b.ff;
}
 
ll powe(ll a,ll b)
{
 ll res=1;
 while(b>0)
  {
   if(b&1)
    {
     res*=a;
     res%=mod;
   }
   a*=a;
   a%=mod;
   b>>=1;
  }
 return res;
}
 
int main()
{
 checkpoint1();
  ll n;
 cin>>n;
 ll a[n],tot=0;
  for(ll i=0;i<n;i++){
    cin>>a[i];
    tot+=a[i];
  }
 ll op=inf;
  for(ll mask=0;mask<(1<<n);mask++)
 {
   ll sum=0,k=0;
   for(ll i=0;i<n;i++)
   {
     if(mask&(1<<i)){
       sum+=a[i];
      }
     else
        k+=a[i];
    }
   if(k==0)
     continue;
    op=min(op,abs(k-sum));
  }
 cout<<op;
 return 0;
}

Distinct Numbers 
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
#define mod 1000000007
void build(ll a[],ll st[],ll v,ll stl,ll str)
{
    if(stl==str)
        st[v]=a[stl];
    else
    {
        ll stm=(stl+str)/2;
        build(a,st,2*v,stl,stm);
        build(a,st,2*v+1,stm+1,str);
        st[v]=min(st[2*v],st[2*v+1]);
    }
}
ll ans(ll st[],ll v,ll stl,ll str,ll l,ll r)
{
    if(l>r)
        return INT_MAX;
    if(l==stl&&r==str)
        return st[v];
    else
    {
        ll stm=(stl+str)/2;
        return min(ans(st,2*v,stl,stm,l,min(r,stm)),ans(st,2*v+1,stm+1,str,max(stm+1,l),r));
    }
}
void upd(ll st[],ll v,ll stl,ll str,ll pos,ll val)
{
    if(stl==str)
        st[v]=val;
    else
    {
        ll stm=stl+str;
        stm/=2;
        if(pos<=stm)
            upd(st,2*v,stl,stm,pos,val);
        else
            upd(st,2*v+1,stm+1,str,pos,val);
        st[v]=min(st[2*v],st[2*v+1]);
    }
}
ll modi(ll a,ll b)
{
    ll res=1;
    while(b>0)
    {
        if(b&1)
        {
            res*=a;
            if(res>=mod)
                res%=mod;
        }
        a*=a;
        if(a>=mod)
            a%=mod;
        b>>=1;
    }
    return res;
}
int main()
{
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(NULL);
    ll n;
    cin>>n;
    set< ll > s;
    for(ll i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
        ll x;
        cin>>x;
        s.insert(x);
    }
    cout<<s.size();
    return 0;

Apartments 
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
int main()
{
    ll n,m,k,x;
    cin>>n>>m>>k;
    multiset< ll > s;
    for(ll i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
        cin>>x;
        s.insert(x);
    }
    ll ans=0;
    ll a[m];
    for(ll i=0;i<m;i++)
        cin>>a[i];
    sort(a,a+m);
    for(ll i=0;i<m;i++)
    {
        x=a[i];
        ll op=x+k;
        x-=k;
        auto it=s.lower_bound(x);
        if(it!=s.end())
        {
            if(*it<=op)
            {
                ans++;
                s.erase(it);
            }
        }
    }
    cout<<ans;
}
Ferris Wheel 
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
#define pb push_back
ll mod=1000000006;
void build(ll a[],ll st[],ll v,ll stl,ll str)
{
    if(stl==str)
        st[v]=a[stl];
    else
    {
        ll stm=(stl+str)/2;
        build(a,st,2*v,stl,stm);
        build(a,st,2*v+1,stm+1,str);
        st[v]=min(st[2*v],st[2*v+1]);
    }
}
ll ans(ll st[],ll v,ll stl,ll str,ll l,ll r)
{
    if(l>r)
        return INT_MAX;
    if(l==stl&&r==str)
        return st[v];
    else
    {
        ll stm=(stl+str)/2;
        return min(ans(st,2*v,stl,stm,l,min(r,stm)),ans(st,2*v+1,stm+1,str,max(stm+1,l),r));
    }
}
void upd(ll st[],ll v,ll stl,ll str,ll pos,ll val)
{
    if(stl==str)
        st[v]=val;
    else
    {
        ll stm=stl+str;
        stm/=2;
        if(pos<=stm)
            upd(st,2*v,stl,stm,pos,val);
        else
            upd(st,2*v+1,stm+1,str,pos,val);
        st[v]=min(st[2*v],st[2*v+1]);
    }
}
ll modi(ll a,ll b)
{
    ll res=1;
    while(b>0)
    {
        if(b&1)
        {
            res*=a;
            res%=mod;
        }
        a*=a;
        a%=mod;
        b>>=1;
    }
    return res;
}
int main()
{
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(NULL);
    ll n,x;
    cin>>n>>x;
    ll a[n];
    for(ll i=0;i<n;i++)
      cin>>a[i];
    sort(a,a+n);
    ll i=0,j=n-1,ans=0;
    while(i<=j)
    {
     if(a[i]+a[j]<=x)
      {
       i++;
        j--;
    }
   else
      j--;
    ans++;
  }
 cout<<ans;
    return 0;
}

 {

   time_interval.push_back({leaving_time,false});

{
    ll n,a,b;
    cin>>n;
    pair< ll,ll > p[n];
    for(ll i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
        cin>>a>>b;
        p[i]={b,a};
    }
    sort(p,p+n);
    ll ans=1;
    ll op=p[0].first;
    for(ll i=1;i<n;i++)
    {
        if(p[i].second>=op)
        {
            op=p[i].first;
            ans++;
        }
    }
    cout<<ans;
}

    cin.tie(NULL);
    ll n,want,x;
    cin>>n>>want;
    pair< ll,ll > p[n+1];
    for(ll i=1;i<=n;i++)
    {
        cin>>x;
        p[i]={x,i};
    }
    sort(p+1,p+n+1);
    ll i=1,j=n;
    while(p[i].first+p[j].first!=want&&i!=j)
    {
      
        if(p[i].first+p[j].first>want)
            j--;
        else 
            i++;
        if(i>=j)
        {
            cout<<"IMPOSSIBLE";
            return 0;
        }
    }
    if(i==j){
     cout<<"IMPOSSIBLE";
     return 0;
    }
    cout<<p[i].second<<" "<<p[j].second;
    return 0;
}

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
int main()
{
    ll n,x;
    cin>>n;
    multiset< ll > s;
    for(ll i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
        cin>>x;
        if(s.empty())
            s.insert(x);
        else
        {
            auto it=s.lower_bound(x+1);
            if(it==s.end())
                s.insert(x);
            else
            {
                s.erase(it);
                s.insert(x);
            }
        }
    }
    cout<<s.size();
    return 0;
}
Room Allocations 
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
#define mod 1000000007
#define pb push_back
#define inf 1e18
#define f first
#define sec second
void checkpoint1()
{
  ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(NULL);
 /*#ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
    freopen("input.txt","r",stdin);
    freopen("output.txt","w",stdout);
  #endif
 */
}
int main()
{
  checkpoint1();
  
 ll n;
 cin>>n;
 pair< pair< ll,ll >,ll > p[n];
  ll x,y;
 for(ll i=0;i<n;i++)
 {
   cin>>x>>y;
    p[i]={{y,x},i};
 }
 sort(p,p+n);
  ll rm=1,ans[n];
 multiset< pair< ll,ll >,greater< pair<int,int> > > s;
 for(ll i=0;i<n;i++)
 {
   if(s.empty())
    {
     s.insert({p[i].f.f,rm});
      ans[p[i].sec]=rm;
     rm++;
   }
   else
    {
     auto it=s.lower_bound({p[i].f.sec,inf});
      if(it==s.end())
      {
       s.insert({p[i].f.f,rm});
        ans[p[i].sec]=rm;
       rm++;
     }
     else
      {
       ll curroom=it->sec;
        s.erase(it);
        s.insert({p[i].f.f,curroom});
       ans[p[i].sec]=curroom;
      }
   }
 }
 rm--;
 cout<<rm<<"\n";
 for(ll i=0;i<n;i++)
   cout<<ans[i]<<" ";
  return 0;
}

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
#define mod 1000000007
#define pb push_back
#define inf 1e18;
void checkpoint1()
{
 ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(NULL);
 /*#ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
    freopen("input.txt","r",stdin);
    freopen("output.txt","w",stdout);
  #endif
 */ 
}
int main()
{
  checkpoint1();
 
 
  ll n,k;
 cin>>n>>k;
  ll a[n],mini=inf;
 for(ll i=0;i<n;i++)
 {
   cin>>a[i];
    mini=min(mini,a[i]);
  }
 ll l=0,r=mini*k;
  while(abs(l-r)>1)
 {
   ll mid=(l+r)/2;
   ll temp=0;
    for(ll i=0;i<n;i++)
     temp+=mid/a[i];
   if(temp<k)
      l=mid;
    else
      r=mid;
  }
 ll ans=inf;
 ll temp=0;
  for(ll i=0;i<n;i++)
   temp+=l/a[i];
 if(temp>=k)
   ans=min(l,ans);
 temp=0;
 for(ll i=0;i<n;i++)
   temp+=r/a[i];
 if(temp>=k)
   ans=min(r,ans);
 cout<<ans;
  return 0;
}

bool comp(pair< ll,ll > &a,pair< ll,ll > &b)
{
 if(a.ff!=b.ff)
   return a.ff<b.ff;
  else
  {
   if(a.ss>b.ss)
     return b.ss<a.ss;
    else if(a.ss<b.ss)
      return a.ss<b.ss;
  }
 return a.ff>b.ff;
}
 
ll powe(ll a,ll b)
{
 ll res=1;
 while(b>0)
  {
   if(b&1)
    {
     res*=a;
     res%=mod;
   }
   a*=a;
   a%=mod;
   b>>=1;
  }
 return res;
}

Sum of Three Values 
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
#define mod 1000000007
#define pii pair<int,int>
int main()
{
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(NULL);
    ll n,tar;
    cin>>n>>tar;
    ll a[n];
    pair< ll ,ll > p[n];
    ll ii=1;
    ll sum=0;
    for(ll i=0;i<n;i++){
        cin>>a[i];
        p[i]={a[i],ii};
        ii++;
    }
    if(n<3)
    {
        cout<<"IMPOSSIBLE";
        return 0;
    }
    ll op=0;
    sort(a,a+n);
    sort(p,p+n);
    ll i,j,k;
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
        j=0;
        k=n-1;
        while(j<k)
        {
            if(i==j||i==k)
            {
                if(i==j)
                    j++;
                else
                    k--;
            }
            if(j>=k)
                break;
            sum=a[i]+a[j]+a[k];
            if(sum!=tar)
            {
                if(sum>tar)
                    k--;
                else
                    j++;
            }
            else
            {
                if(sum==tar&&i!=j&&j!=k&&k!=i)
                {
                    op=1;
                    break;
                }
            }
        }
        if(op==1){
            i=p[i].second;
            j=p[j].second;
            k=p[k].second;
            break;
        }
    }
    if(op==1)
        cout<<i<<" "<<j<<" "<<k;
    else
        cout<<"IMPOSSIBLE";
    return 0;
}
Sum of Four Values 
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
#define mod 1000000007
#define pb push_back
#define inf 1e18;
void checkpoint1()
{
 ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(NULL);
 /*#ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
    freopen("input.txt","r",stdin);
    freopen("output.txt","w",stdout);
  #endif
 */
}
int main()
{
  checkpoint1();
 
 
  ll n,target;
  cin>>n>>target;
 ll elements[n+1];
 for(ll i=1;i<=n;i++)
    cin>>elements[i];
 if(n<4){
    cout<<"IMPOSSIBLE";
   return 0;
  }
 vector< tuple<ll,ll,ll> > combination;
  for(ll i=1;i<n;i++)
 {
   for(ll j=i+1;j<=n;j++)
      combination.emplace_back(elements[i]+elements[j],i,j);
  }
 sort(combination.begin(),combination.end());
  for(ll i=0;i<combination.size()-1;i++)
  {
   ll some=get<0>(combination[i]);
   auto more=lower_bound(&combination[i+1],&combination[combination.size()],make_tuple(target-some,0,0));
    while(some+get<0>(*more)==target)
    {
     ll idx1,idx2,idx3,idx4,idx5,idx6;
     tie(idx1,idx2,idx3)=combination[i];
     tie(idx4,idx5,idx6)=(*more);
      if(idx2==idx5||idx2==idx6||idx3==idx5||idx3==idx6)
       more++;
     else
      {
       cout<<idx2<<" "<<idx3<<" "<<idx5<<" "<<idx6;
        return 0;
      }
   }
 }
 cout<<"IMPOSSIBLE";
 return 0;
}

#define mod 1000000007

void checkpoint1()
{
 ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(NULL);
 /*#ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
    freopen("input.txt","r",stdin);
    freopen("output.txt","w",stdout);
  #endif
 */

int main()
{
  checkpoint1();
 
 
  ll n;
 cin>>n;
 ll a[n+1];
  a[0]=0;
 ll ans[n+1];
  ans[0]=ans[1]=0;
  for(ll i=1;i<=n;i++)
    cin>>a[i];
  for(ll i=2;i<=n;i++)
  {
   if(a[i]>a[i-1])
     ans[i]=i-1;
   else
    {
     ll j=i-1;
     while(a[i]<=a[j])
       j=ans[j];
     ans[i]=j;
   }
 }
 for(ll i=1;i<=n;i++)
    cout<<ans[i]<<" ";
  return 0;
}

    m[0]=1;
    ll tot=0,ans=0;
    for(ll i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
        ll x;
        cin>>x;
        tot+=x;
        if(m.find(tot-k)!=m.end())
            ans+=m[tot-k];

    }

void terminAtor()
{
  ll n;
 cin>>n;
 ll a[n];
  for(ll i=0;i<n;i++){
    cin>>a[i];
  }
 for(ll i=1;i<n;i++){
    a[i]+=a[i-1];
 }
 for(ll i=0;i<n;i++)
 {
   a[i]%=n;
    a[i]+=n;
    a[i]%=n;
  }
 ll ans=0;
 map< ll,ll > m;
 m[0]=1;
 for(ll i=0;i<n;i++)
 {
   if(m.find(a[i])!=m.end())
      ans+=m[a[i]];
   m[a[i]]++;
  }
 cout<<ans;
}

 checkpoint1();

/*******************************************************/ 
 
 terminAtor();

 return 0;

//#pragma GCC optimize("Ofast")
//#pragma GCC target("avx,avx2,fma")
//#pragma GCC optimization ("unroll-loops")
 
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
 
#define ll long long
#define ld long double
#define mod 1000000007
#define pb push_back
#define inf 1000000000000000000
#define ff first
#define ss second
#define deb(x) cout<<#x<<" "<<x<<"\n"
#define Clear(x) memset(x,0,sizeof(x))
#define all(x) (x).begin(),(x).end()
 
void checkpoint1()
{
  /******think more code less******/
  ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
 cin.tie(NULL);
  // #ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
 //   freopen("input.txt","r",stdin);
  //   freopen("output.txt","w",stdout);
  // #endif
}
 
bool comp(pair< ll,ll > &a,pair< ll,ll > &b)
{
 if(a.ff!=b.ff)
   return a.ff<b.ff;
  else
  {
   if(a.ss>b.ss)
     return b.ss<a.ss;
    else if(a.ss<b.ss)
      return a.ss<b.ss;
  }
 return a.ff>b.ff;
}
 
ll powe(ll a,ll b)
{
 ll res=1;
 while(b>0)
  {
   if(b&1)
    {
     res*=a;
     res%=mod;
   }
   a*=a;
   a%=mod;
   b>>=1;
  }
 return res;
}
bool canwe(ll a[],ll m,ll k,ll n)
{
 ll count=0,tot=0;
 for(ll i=0;i<n;i++)
 {
   if(a[i]>m)
      return 0;
    tot+=a[i];
    if(tot>m)
   {
     count++;
      i--;
      tot=0;
    }
 }
 count++;
  return count<=k;
}
int main()
{
  checkpoint1();
  ll n,k;
 cin>>n>>k;
  ll a[n];
  ll l=1,r=0;
 for(ll i=0;i<n;i++)
 {
   cin>>a[i];
    r+=a[i];
  }
 ll op=r;
  while(r>l+1)
  {
   ll m=(l+r)/2;
   if(canwe(a,m,k,n))
   {
     r=m;
      op=m;
   }
   else
      l=m;
  }
 cout<<op;
 return 0;
}
Movie Festival II 
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
#define mod 1000000007
#define pb push_back
#define inf 1e18
void checkpoint1()
{
 ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(NULL);
 /*#ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
    freopen("input.txt","r",stdin);
    freopen("output.txt","w",stdout);
  #endif
 */
}
int main()
{
  checkpoint1();
  
 ll n,k;
 cin>>n>>k;
  ll x,y;
 pair< ll,ll > p[n];
 for(ll i=0;i<n;i++)
 {
   cin>>x>>y;
    p[i]={y,x};
 }
 sort(p,p+n);
  ll ans=0;
 multiset< ll,greater<int> > s;
  for(ll i=0;i<n;i++)
 {
   if(s.empty())
    {
     s.insert(p[i].first);
     k--;
      ans++;
    }
   else
    {
     auto it=s.lower_bound(p[i].second);
     if(it!=s.end())
      {
       s.erase(it);
        s.insert(p[i].first);
       ans++;
      }
     else if(k>0)
      {
       k--;
        s.insert(p[i].first);
       ans++;
      }
   }
 }
 cout<<ans;
  return 0;
}

ll dp[1000001];
ll go(ll n)
{
    if(n==0)
        return 1;
    if(n<0)
        return 0;
    if(dp[n]!=-1)
        return dp[n];
    ll ans=0;
    for(ll i=1;i<=6;i++){
        ans+=go(n-i);
        ans%=mod;
    }
    return dp[n]=ans;
}
void terminAtor()
{
    memset(dp,-1,sizeof(dp));
    ll n;
    cin>>n;
    cout<<go(n);
}

void terminAtor()
{
    ll n,x;
    cin>>n>>x;
    vector< ll > dp(x+1,inf);
    dp[0]=0;
    ll a[n];
    for(ll i=0;i<n;i++)
        cin>>a[i];
    for(ll i=1;i<=x;i++)
    {
        for(ll j=0;j<n;j++)
        {
            if(i-a[j]>=0)
                dp[i]=min(dp[i],dp[i-a[j]]+1);
        }
    }
    if(dp[x]==inf)
        dp[x]=-1;
    cout<<dp[x];
}

Removing Digits 
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
#define mod 1000000007
#define pb push_back
#define inf 1e18;

 ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(NULL);

ll fact[1000009];
ll powe(ll a,ll b)
{
  ll res=1;
 while(b>0)
  {
   if(b&1)
    {
     res*=a;
     res%=mod;
   }
   a*=a;
   a%=mod;
   b>>=1;
  }
 return res;
}
ll power(ll x,ll y,ll m) 
{ 
    if (y == 0) 
        return 1; 
    ll p = power(x, y/2, m) % m; 
    p = (p * p) % m; 
  
    return (y%2 == 0)? p : (x * p) % m; 
} 
int main()
{
  checkpoint1();
  
 
  ll n,ans=0;
 cin>>n;
 string s=to_string(n);
  while(n!=0)
  {
   ll k=s.length();
    ll mini=0;
    for(ll i=0;i<k;i++){
      ll op=s[i]-'0';
     mini=max(mini,op);
    }
   n-=mini;
    ans++;
    s=to_string(n);
 }
 cout<<ans;
  return 0;
}

ll dp[1005][1005];
void terminAtor()
{
    ll n;
    cin>>n;
    char a[n][n];
    for(ll i=0;i<n;i++)
        for(ll j=0;j<n;j++)
            cin>>a[i][j];
    if(a[0][0]=='*' || a[n-1][n-1]=='*'){
        cout<<0;
        exit(0);
    }
    for(ll i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
        for(ll j=0;j<n;j++)
        {
            if(i+j==0)
                dp[i][0]=1;
            else
            {
                if(a[i][j]=='*')
                    continue;
                dp[i][j]=(i-1<0 ?0 :dp[i-1][j])+(j-1<0 ?0 :dp[i][j-1]);
                dp[i][j]%=mod;
            }
        }
    }
    cout<<dp[n-1][n-1];
}

bool comp(pair< ll,ll > &a,pair< ll,ll > &b)

        return a.ff<b.ff;
    else
    {
        if(a.ss>b.ss)

        else if(a.ss<b.ss)

ll powe(ll a,ll b)
{
    ll res=1;
    while(b>0)
    {
        if(b&1)

            res*=a;

ll dp[100001][101];
void terminAtor()
{
    ll n,m;
    cin>>n>>m;
    ll a[n];
    for(ll i=0;i<n;i++)
        cin>>a[i];
    if(a[0]==0)
    {
        for(ll i=0;i<=m;i++)
            dp[0][i]=1;
        dp[0][0]=0;
    }
    else
    {
        for(ll i=0;i<=m;i++)
            dp[0][i]=0;
        dp[0][a[0]]=1;
    }
 
    for(ll i=1;i<n;i++)
    {
        for(ll j=1;j<=m;j++)
        {
            if(a[i]==0)
            {
                dp[i][j]=dp[i-1][j];
                if(j-1>=1)
                    dp[i][j]+=dp[i-1][j-1];
                if(j+1<=m)
                    dp[i][j]+=dp[i-1][j+1];
                dp[i][j]%=mod;
            }
            else
            {
                dp[i][a[i]]=dp[i-1][a[i]];
                if(a[i]-1>=1)
                    dp[i][a[i]]+=dp[i-1][a[i]-1];
                if(a[i]+1<=m)
                    dp[i][a[i]]+=dp[i-1][a[i]+1];
                dp[i][a[i]]%=mod;
                break;
            }
        }
    }
    ll ans=0;
    for(ll i=1;i<=m;i++)
    {
        ans+=dp[n-1][i];
        ans%=mod;
    }
    cout<<ans;
}
 
int main()
{    
    checkpoint1();
/********************************************************/    
    // auto startrrr = high_resolution_clock::now();
    // cout << setprecision(20);
/*******************************************************/    
    
    terminAtor();
 
 
/*******************************************************/

bool comp(pair< ll,ll > &a,pair< ll,ll > &b)
{
    if(a.ff!=b.ff)
        return a.ff<b.ff;
    else
    {
        if(a.ss>b.ss)
            return b.ss<a.ss;
        else if(a.ss<b.ss)
            return a.ss<b.ss;
    }
    return a.ff>b.ff;
}
 
ll powe(ll a,ll b)
{
    ll res=1;
    while(b>0)
    {
        if(b&1)
        {
            res*=a;
            res%=mod;
        }
        a*=a;
        a%=mod;
        b>>=1;
    }
    return res;
}
string s,t;
ll n,m;
ll dp[5005][5005];
ll go(ll i,ll j)
{
    if(i<0)
        return j+1;
    if(j<0)
        return i+1;
    if(dp[i][j]!=inf)
        return dp[i][j];
 
    if(s[i]==t[j])
    {
        dp[i][j]=go(i-1,j-1);
        return dp[i][j];
    }
    else
    {
        ll ins=1+go(i-1,j);
        ll rep=1+go(i,j-1);
        ll rem=1+go(i-1,j-1);
        dp[i][j]=min({rem,ins,rep});
        return dp[i][j];
    }
}
void terminAtor()
{
    cin>>s>>t;
    n=s.length();
    m=t.length();
    for(ll i=0;i<5005;i++)
    {
        for(ll j=0;j<5005;j++)
            dp[i][j]=inf;
    }
    cout<< go(n-1,m-1);
}

Money Sums 
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
#define ld long double
#define mod 1000000007
#define pb push_back
#define inf 1000000000000000000
void checkpoint1()
{
 ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(NULL);
 /*#ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
    freopen("input.txt","r",stdin);
    freopen("output.txt","w",stdout);
  #endif
    */  
}
int main()
{
  checkpoint1();
  ll n;
 cin>>n;
 ll a[n];
  set< ll > s;
 for(ll i=0;i<n;i++)
 {
   cin>>a[i];
    if(s.empty())
      s.insert(a[i]);
   else
    {
       set< ll > ss; 
      for(auto it:s)
      {
       ll add=it+a[i];
       ss.insert(add);
     }
     s.insert(a[i]);
     for(auto it:ss)
         s.insert(it);
   }
 }
 cout<<s.size()<<"\n";
 for(auto i:s)
   cout<<i<<" ";
 return 0;
}

bool comp(pair< ll,ll > &a,pair< ll,ll > &b)
{
 if(a.ff!=b.ff)
   return a.ff<b.ff;
  else
  {
   if(a.ss>b.ss)
     return b.ss<a.ss;
    else if(a.ss<b.ss)
      return a.ss<b.ss;
  }
 return a.ff>b.ff;
}
 
ll powe(ll a,ll b)
{
 ll res=1;
 while(b>0)
  {
   if(b&1)
    {
     res*=a;
     res%=mod;
   }
   a*=a;
   a%=mod;
   b>>=1;
  }
 return res;
}
ll a[5001];
ll n;
ll dp[5001][5001];
ll go(ll i,ll j)
{
 if(i==j)
   return a[i];
  if(i+1==j)
   return max(a[i],a[j]);
  if(dp[i][j]!=-1)
   return dp[i][j];
 
 ll op=a[i]+min(go(i+2,j),go(i+1,j-1));
  ll ok=a[j]+min(go(i+1,j-1),go(i,j-2));
  return dp[i][j]=max(ok,op);
 //return dp[i][j]=max(a[i]+min(go(i+1,j-1),go(i+2,j)),a[j]+min(go(i+1,j-1),go(i,j-2)));
}
void terminAtor()
{
 cin>>n;
 for(ll i=0;i<n;i++)
   cin>>a[i];
  memset(dp,-1,sizeof(dp));
 cout<< go(0,n-1);
}

void terminAtor()
{
  ll n;
 cin>>n;
 ll a[n];
  for(ll i=0;i<n;i++)
   a[i]=i+1;
 ll m=n*(n+1);
 m/=2;
 if(m%2)
  {
   cout<<0;
    return;
  }
 m/=2;
 ll dp[501][m+100];
  Clear(dp);
 dp[0][0]=1;
 for(ll i=1;i<=n;i++)
  {
   for(ll j=0;j<=m;j++)
    {
     dp[i][j]=dp[i-1][j];
      if(j-a[i-1]>=0)
       dp[i][j]+=dp[i-1][j-a[i-1]];
      dp[i][j]%=mod;
    }
 }
 dp[n][m]%=mod;
  dp[n][m]*=powe(2,mod-2);
  dp[n][m]%=mod;
  cout<<dp[n][m];
}

Increasing Subsequence 
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
#define mod 1000000007
#define pii pair<int,int>
int main()
{
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(NULL);
    ll n;
    cin>>n;
    multiset< ll > s;
    ll x;
    for(ll i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
        cin>>x;
        if(s.empty()==1)
            s.insert(x);
        else
        {
            auto it=s.lower_bound(x);
            if(it==s.end())
                s.insert(x);
            else
            {
                s.erase(it);
                s.insert(x);
            }
        }
    }
    cout<<s.size();
    return 0;
}

bool comp(pair< ll,ll > &a,pair< ll,ll > &b)
{
    if(a.ff!=b.ff)
        return a.ff<b.ff;
    else
    {
        if(a.ss>b.ss)
            return b.ss<a.ss;
        else if(a.ss<b.ss)

}
 
ll powe(ll a,ll b)
{
    ll res=1;
    while(b>0)
    {
        if(b&1)
        {
            res*=a;
            res%=mod;

vector< pair<pair<ll,ll>,ll> > a;
ll dp[200005];
ll n;
ll bs(ll N)
{
    ll i=0,j=n-1;
    while(i+1<j)
    {
        ll m=i+j;
        m/=2;
        if(a[m].ff.ff<N)
            i=m;
        else
            j=m;
    }
    if(a[i].ff.ff>=N)
        return i;
    if(a[j].ff.ff>=N)
        return j;
    return n;
}
ll go(ll i)
{
    if(i>=n)
        return 0;
    if(dp[i]!=-1)
        return dp[i];
 
    ll next = bs(a[i].ff.ss+1);
    return dp[i]=max(a[i].ss+go(next),go(i+1));
}
 
void terminAtor()
{
    cin>>n;
    a.resize(n);
    memset(dp,-1,sizeof(dp));
    for(ll i=0;i<n;i++){
        cin>>a[i].ff.ff>>a[i].ff.ss>>a[i].ss;
    }
    sort(all(a));
    cout<< go(0) ;
}

Graph Algorithms

Counting Rooms 
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
#define ld long double
#define mod 1000000007
#define pb push_back
#define inf 1000000000000000000
#define ff first
#define ss second
void checkpoint1()
{
  ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
 cin.tie(NULL);
  /*#ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
    freopen("input.txt","r",stdin);
    freopen("output.txt","w",stdout);
  #endif*/
}
ll n,m;
char a[1001][1001];
bool vis[1001][1001];
bool is_val(ll x,ll y)
{
 if(x>=0&&x<n&&y>=0&&y<m)
   return 1;
  return 0;
}
ll dx[]={-1,0,1,0};
ll dy[]={0,-1,0,1};
void dfs(ll x,ll y)
{
  for(ll i=0;i<4;i++)
 {
   if(is_val(x+dx[i],y+dy[i]))
    {
     if(!vis[x+dx[i]][y+dy[i]]&&a[x+dx[i]][y+dy[i]]=='.')
     {
       vis[x+dx[i]][y+dy[i]]=1;
        dfs(x+dx[i],y+dy[i]);
     }
   }
 }
}
int main()
{
  checkpoint1();
  cin>>n>>m;
  for(ll i=0;i<n;i++)
 {
   for(ll j=0;j<m;j++)
   {
     cin>>a[i][j];
     vis[i][j]=0;
    }
 }
 ll cc=0;
  for(ll i=0;i<n;i++)
 {
   for(ll j=0;j<m;j++)
   {
     if(!vis[i][j]&&a[i][j]=='.')
     {
       vis[i][j]=1;
        dfs(i,j);
       cc++;
     }
   }
 }
 cout<<cc<<"\n";
 return 0;
}
Building Roads 
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
#define ld long double
#define mod 1000000007
#define pb push_back
#define inf 1000000000000000000
#define ff first
#define ss second
void checkpoint1()
{
  ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
 cin.tie(NULL);
  /*#ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
    freopen("input.txt","r",stdin);
    freopen("output.txt","w",stdout);
  #endif*/
}
vector< vector<ll> > adj;
vector< bool > vis;
vector< ll > pres;
ll cc=1;
void dfs(ll v)
{
  for(auto u:adj[v])
  {
   if(!vis[u])
    {
     vis[u]=1;
     pres[u]=cc;
     dfs(u);
   }
 }
}
int32_t main()
{
  checkpoint1();
  ll n,m;
 cin>>n>>m;
  adj.resize(n+1);
  vis.resize(n+1);
  pres.resize(n+1);
 for(ll i=0;i<=n;i++)
    vis[i]=pres[i]=0;
 while(m--)
 {
   ll x,y;cin>>x>>y;
   adj[x].pb(y);
   adj[y].pb(x);
 }
 for(ll i=1;i<=n;i++)
  {
   if(!vis[i])
    {
     vis[i]=1;
     pres[i]=cc;
     dfs(i);
     cc++;
   }
 }
 cout<<(cc-2)<<"\n";
 ll k=2;
 for(ll i=1;i<=n;i++)
  {
   if(pres[i]==k)
   {
     cout<<1<<" "<<i<<"\n";
      k++;
    }
 }
 return 0;
}
Message Route 
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
#define ld long double
#define mod 1000000007
#define pb push_back
#define inf 1000000000000000000
#define ff first
#define ss second
void checkpoint1()
{
  ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(NULL);
 /*#ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
    freopen("input.txt","r",stdin);
    freopen("output.txt","w",stdout);
  #endif
 */
}
void solve()
{
  ll n,m;
 cin>>n>>m;
  vector< ll > adj[n+1];
  while(m--)
 {
   ll x,y;
   cin>>x>>y;
    adj[x].pb(y);
   adj[y].pb(x);
 }
 bool vis[n+1]={0};
  ll dis[n+1],route[n+1];
 for(ll i=1;i<=n;i++)
    dis[i]=inf;
 route[0]=route[1]=0;
  queue< ll > q;
  q.push(1);
  dis[1]=1;
 vis[1]=1;
 while(!q.empty())
  {
   ll v=q.front();
   q.pop();
    for(auto u:adj[v])
    {
     if(!vis[u])
      {
       vis[u]=1;
       q.push(u);
        dis[u]=min(dis[u],dis[v]+1);
        if(dis[u]==dis[v]+1)
         route[u]=v;
     }
 
    }
 }
 if(dis[n]==inf)
    cout<<"IMPOSSIBLE";
 else
  {
   cout<<dis[n]<<"\n";
   vector< ll > ans;
   for(ll i=n;i!=0;i=route[i])
      ans.pb(i);
    reverse(ans.begin(), ans.end());
    for(auto i:ans)
     cout<<i<<" ";
 }
}
/*--------Think More Code Less---------*/
int main()
{
  checkpoint1();
  solve();
  return 0;
}

void checkpoint1()
{
    /******think more code less******/
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(NULL);

bool comp(pair< ll,ll > &a,pair< ll,ll > &b)
{
    if(a.ff!=b.ff)
        return a.ff<b.ff;
    else
    {
        if(a.ss>b.ss)
            return b.ss<a.ss;
        else if(a.ss<b.ss)
            return a.ss<b.ss;
    }
    return a.ff>b.ff;
}
 
ll powe(ll a,ll b)
{
    ll res=1;
    while(b>0)
    {
        if(b&1)
        {
            res*=a;
            res%=mod;
        }
        a*=a;
        a%=mod;
        b>>=1;
    }
    return res;
}
vector< ll > adj[100005];
vector< ll > ans(100005,-4);
bool vis[100005];
bool ok=1;
void dfs(ll v,ll p)
{
    vis[v]=1;
    ans[v]=p;
    for(auto u:adj[v])
    {
        if(!vis[u])
            dfs(u,(1^p));
        else
        {
            if(ans[u]==p)
            {
                ok=0;
                return;
            }
        }
    }
}
void terminAtor()
{
    ll n,m;
    cin>>n>>m;
    for(ll i=0;i<m;i++)
    {
        ll x,y;
        cin>>x>>y;
        adj[x].pb(y);
        adj[y].pb(x);
    }
    for(ll i=1;i<=n;i++)
    {
        if(!vis[i]){
            ok=1;
            dfs(i,1);
            if(ok==0)
                break;
        }
    }
    if(ok==0)
        cout<<"IMPOSSIBLE";
    else
    {
        for(ll i=1;i<=n;i++)
            cout<<ans[i]+1<<" ";
    }
}
 
int main()
{    
    checkpoint1();
/********************************************************/    
    
/*******************************************************/    
    
    terminAtor();
 
 
/*******************************************************/    
    
/*******************************************************/        
    return 0;
}

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
//using namespace chrono;
 
#define ll long long
#define ld long double
#define mod 1000000007
#define pb push_back
#define inf 1000000000000000000
#define ff first
#define ss second
#define deb(x) cout<<#x<<" "<<x<<"\n"
#define Clear(x) memset(x,0,sizeof(x))

bool comp(pair< ll,ll > &a,pair< ll,ll > &b)
{
    if(a.ff!=b.ff)
        return a.ff<b.ff;
    else
    {
        if(a.ss>b.ss)
            return b.ss<a.ss;
        else if(a.ss<b.ss)
            return a.ss<b.ss;
    }
    return a.ff>b.ff;
}
 
ll powe(ll a,ll b)
{
    ll res=1;
    while(b>0)
    {
        if(b&1)
        {
            res*=a;
            res%=mod;
        }
        a*=a;
        a%=mod;
        b>>=1;
    }
    return res;
}
 
void terminAtor()
{
    ll n,m;
    cin>>n>>m;
    vector< pair<ll,ll> > adj[n+1];
    for(ll i=0;i<m;i++)
    {
        ll x,y,z;
        cin>>x>>y>>z;
        adj[x].pb({z,y});
        //adj[y].pb({z,x});
    }
    ll dis[n+1];
    bool vis[n+1];
    for(ll i=1;i<=n;i++){
        dis[i]=inf;
        vis[i]=0;
    }
    dis[1]=0;
    priority_queue< pair<ll,ll>,vector<pair<ll,ll>>,greater<pair<ll,ll>> > pq;
    pq.push({0,1});
    while(pq.empty()==0)
    {
        ll v=pq.top().ss;
        ll d=pq.top().ff;
        pq.pop();
        if(vis[v])
            continue;
        vis[v]=1;
        for(auto u:adj[v])
        {
            if(d+u.ff<dis[u.ss])
            {
                dis[u.ss]=d+u.ff;
                pq.push({dis[u.ss],u.ss});
            }
        }
    }
    for(ll i=1;i<=n;i++)
        cout<<dis[i]<<" ";
}

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
#define ld long double
#define mod 1000000007
#define pb push_back
#define inf 1000000000000000000
#define ff first
#define ss second
void checkpoint1()
{
  /******think more code less******/
  ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
 cin.tie(NULL);
  /*#ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
    freopen("input.txt","r",stdin);
    freopen("output.txt","w",stdout);
  #endif*/
}
int main()
{
  checkpoint1();
  ll n,m,q;
 cin>>n>>m>>q;
 ll dis[n+1][n+1];
 for(ll i=1;i<=n;i++){
   for(ll j=1;j<=n;j++){
     dis[i][j]=inf;
      if(i==j)
       dis[i][j]=0;
    }
 }
 while(m--)
 {
   ll x,y,z;
   cin>>x>>y>>z;
   dis[x][y]=min(dis[x][y],z);
   dis[y][x]=min(z,dis[y][x]);
 }
 for(ll k=1;k<=n;k++)
  {
   for(ll i=1;i<=n;i++)
    {
     for(ll j=1;j<=n;j++)
      {
       dis[i][j]=min(dis[i][j],dis[i][k]+dis[k][j]);
     }
   }
 }
 while(q--)
 {
   ll x,y;
   cin>>x>>y;
    dis[x][y]>=inf ?cout<<-1<<"\n" :cout<<dis[x][y]<<"\n";
  }
 return 0;
}

bool comp(pair< ll,ll > &a,pair< ll,ll > &b)
{
    if(a.ff!=b.ff)
        return a.ff<b.ff;
    else
    {
        if(a.ss>b.ss)
            return b.ss<a.ss;
        else if(a.ss<b.ss)
            return a.ss<b.ss;
    }
    return a.ff>b.ff;
}
 
ll powe(ll a,ll b)
{
    ll res=1;
    while(b>0)
    {
        if(b&1)
        {
            res*=a;
            res%=mod;
        }
        a*=a;
        a%=mod;
        b>>=1;
    }
    return res;
}
 
void terminAtor()
{
    ll n,m;
    cin>>n>>m;
    pair< pair<ll,ll>,ll > routes[m];
    vector< pair<ll,ll> > adj[n+1],adjr[n+1];
    for(ll i=0;i<m;i++)
    {
        ll x,y,z;
        cin>>x>>y>>z;
        adj[x].pb({z,y});
        adjr[y].pb({z,x});
        routes[i]={{x,y},z};
    }
    bool vis[n+1];
    ll dis[n+1],disr[n+1];
    for(ll i=0;i<=n;i++)
    {
        vis[i]=0;
        dis[i]=disr[i]=inf;
    }
    priority_queue< pair<ll,ll> ,vector< pair<ll,ll> > ,greater<pair<ll,ll>> >pq;
    pq.push({0LL,1LL});
    dis[1]=0;
    while(!pq.empty())
    {
        ll v=pq.top().ss;
        ll d=pq.top().ff;
        pq.pop();
        if(vis[v])
            continue;
        vis[v]=1;
        for(auto u:adj[v])
        {
            if(d+u.ff<dis[u.ss])
            {
                dis[u.ss]=u.ff+d;
                pq.push({dis[u.ss],u.ss});
            }
        }
    }
    Clear(vis);
    disr[n]=0;
    pq.push({0LL,n});
    while(!pq.empty())
    {
        ll v=pq.top().ss;
        ll d=pq.top().ff;
        pq.pop();
        if(vis[v])
            continue;
        vis[v]=1;
        for(auto u:adjr[v])
        {
            if(d+u.ff<disr[u.ss])
            {
                disr[u.ss]=u.ff+d;
                pq.push({disr[u.ss],u.ss});
            }
        }
    }
    ll ans=inf;
    for(ll i=0;i<m;i++)
    {
        ll x=routes[i].ff.ff,y=routes[i].ff.ss,z=routes[i].ss;
        ll temp=dis[x]+disr[y]+(z/2);
        ans=min(ans,temp);
    }
    cout<<ans;
    return;
}
 
int main()
{    
    checkpoint1();
 
/*******************************************************/    
    
    terminAtor();
 
 
/*******************************************************/    
   
/*******************************************************/        
    return 0;
}

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
#define ld long double
#define mod 1000000007
#define pb push_back
#define inf 1000000000000000000
#define ff first
#define ss second
void checkpoint1()
{
  ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
 cin.tie(NULL);
  /*#ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
    freopen("input.txt","r",stdin);
    freopen("output.txt","w",stdout);
  #endif*/
}
int main()
{
  checkpoint1();
  ll n,m;
 cin>>n>>m;
  vector< ll > adj[n+1];
  vector< bool > vis(n+1,0);
  vector< ll > ans;
 vector< ll > dependencies(n+1,0);
 while(m--)
 {
   ll x,y;
   cin>>x>>y;
    adj[x].pb(y);
   dependencies[y]++;
  }
 priority_queue< ll,vector<ll>,greater<int> > q;
  for(ll i=1;i<=n;i++)
  {
   if(dependencies[i]==0)
   {
     vis[i]=1;
     q.push(i);
    }
 }
 while(!q.empty())
  {
   ll v=q.top();
   q.pop();
    ans.pb(v);
    for(auto u:adj[v])
    {
     if(!vis[u])
      {
       dependencies[u]--;
        if(dependencies[u]==0)
       {
         vis[u]=1;
         q.push(u);
        }
     }
   }
 }
 if((ll)ans.size()==n)
  {
   for(auto i:ans)
     cout<<i<<" ";
 }
 else
    cout<<"IMPOSSIBLE";
 return 0;
}

void terminAtor()
{
    ll n,m;
    cin>>n>>m;
    vector< ll > adj[n+1],ans,deg(n+1,0);
    vector< bool > vis(n+1,0);
 
    for(ll i=0;i<m;i++)
    {
        ll x,y;
        cin>>x>>y;
        adj[x].pb(y);
        deg[y]++;
    }   
    queue< ll > q;
    for(ll i=1;i<=n;i++)
    {
        if(!deg[i])
        {
            q.push(i);
            vis[i]=1;
        }
    }
    while(!q.empty())
    {
        ll v=q.front();
        q.pop();
        ans.pb(v);
        for(auto u:adj[v])
        {
            if(!vis[u])
            {
                deg[u]--;
                if(!deg[u]){
                    vis[u]=1;
                    q.push(u);
                }
            }
 
        }
    }
    vector< ll > dp(n+1,0);
    dp[1]=1;
    for(auto v:ans)
    {
        for(auto u:adj[v]){
            dp[u]+=dp[v];
            dp[u]%=mod;
        }
    }
    cout<<dp[n];
}

void terminAtor()
{
  ll n,m;
 cin>>n>>m;
  pair< ll,pair<ll,ll> > p[m];
  ll comp[n+1],sz[n+1];
 for(ll i=0;i<=n;i++)
  {
   sz[i]=1;
    comp[i]=i;
  }
 for(ll i=0;i<m;i++)
 {
   ll x,y,z;
   cin>>x>>y>>z;
   p[i]={z,{x,y}};
 }
 sort(p,p+m);
  ll cost=0;
  for(ll i=0;i<m;i++)
 {
   ll x=p[i].ss.ff,y=p[i].ss.ss,z=p[i].ff;
   ll A=x,B=y;
   while(x^comp[x])
     x=comp[x];
    while(y^comp[y])
     y=comp[y];
 
   if(x!=y)
   {
     cost+=z;
      if(sz[y]>sz[x])
       swap(x,y);
      comp[y]=comp[A]=comp[B]=x;
      sz[x]+=sz[y];
   }
 }
 bool ok=0;
  for(auto i:sz)
  {
   if(i>=n)
      ok=1;
 }
 ok==1 ?cout<<cost :cout<<"IMPOSSIBLE";
}

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll int
#define ld long double
#define mod 1000000007
#define pb push_back
#define inf 1000000000000000000
#define ff first
#define ss second
void checkpoint1()
{
  /******think more code less******/
  ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
 cin.tie(NULL);
  cout.tie(NULL);
 /*#ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
    freopen("input.txt","r",stdin);
    freopen("output.txt","w",stdout);
  #endif*/

int32_t main()
{
  checkpoint1();
  ll n,m;
 cin>>n>>m;
  ll cc=n,maxi=1;
 ll size[n+1],comp[n+1];
 for(ll i=0;i<=n;i++){
   comp[i]=i;
    size[i]=1;
  }
 while(m--)
 {
   ll x,y;
   cin>>x>>y;
    ll a=x,b=y;
   while(a^comp[a])
     a=comp[a];
    while(b^comp[b])
     b=comp[b];
    if(a!=b)
   {
     if(size[b]>=size[a])
      {
       size[b]+=size[a];
       maxi=max(size[b],maxi);
       comp[y]=b;
        comp[x]=b;
        comp[a]=b;
        //comp[b]=a;
        cc--;
     }
     else
      {
       size[a]+=size[b];
       maxi=max(size[a],maxi);
       comp[y]=a;
        comp[x]=a;
        comp[b]=a;
        cc--;
     }
   }
   cout<<cc<<" "<<maxi<<"\n";
    
 }
 return 0;
}

bool canwe(ll a[],ll k,ll n,ll m)
{
 ll op=0;
  for(ll i=0;i<n;i++)
 {
   op+=(m/a[i]);
 }
 return op>=k;
}

stack< ll > s;

void dfs(ll v)
{
  vis[v]=1;
 for(auto u:adj[v])
  {
   if(!vis[u])
      dfs(u);
 }
 s.push(v);
}
void dfs1(ll v)
{
  vis[v]=1;
 dis[v]=op;
  for(auto u:adjr[v])
 {
   if(!vis[u])
      dfs1(u);
  }
}

 cin>>n>>m;

 {
   ll x,y;
   cin>>x>>y;
    adj[x].pb(y);
   adjr[y].pb(x);
  }
 for(ll i=1;i<=n;i++)
  {
   if(!vis[i])
      dfs(i);
 }
 Clear(vis);
  ll ans=s.top();
 while(!s.empty())
  {
   ll v=s.top();
   s.pop();
    if(!vis[v])
    {
     if(op>1)
      {
       cout<<"NO\n"<<v<<" "<<ans;
        return 0;
      }
     dfs1(v);
      op++;
   }
 }
 cout<<"YES";
  return 0;
}

bool comp(pair< ll,ll > &a,pair< ll,ll > &b)
{
  if(a.ff!=b.ff)
   return a.ff<b.ff;
  else
  {
   if(a.ss>b.ss)
     return b.ss<a.ss;
    else if(a.ss<b.ss)
      return a.ss<b.ss;
  }
 return a.ff>b.ff;

vector< ll > adj[100005],adjr[100005];
bool vis[100005];
stack< ll > s;
ll dis[100005];
bool pushed[100005];
ll op=0;
void dfs(ll v)
{
 vis[v]=1;
 for(auto u:adj[v])
  {
   if(!vis[u])
      dfs(u);
 }
 if(!pushed[v]){
    s.push(v);
    pushed[v]=1;
  }
}
void dfss(ll v)
{
 vis[v]=1;
 dis[v]=op;
  for(auto u:adjr[v])
 {
   if(!vis[u])
      dfss(u);
  }
}
int main()
{
  checkpoint1();
  ll n,m;
 cin>>n>>m;
  Clear(dis);
  Clear(vis);
  Clear(pushed);
 while(m--)
 {
   ll x,y;
   cin>>x>>y;
    adj[x].pb(y);
   adjr[y].pb(x);
  }
 for(ll i=1;i<=n;i++)
  {
   if(!vis[i])
    {
     dfs(i);
   }
 }
 Clear(vis);
  while(!s.empty())
  {
   ll v=s.top();
   s.pop();
    if(!vis[v])
    {
     dfss(v);
      op++;
   }
 }
 cout<<op<<"\n";
 for(ll i=1;i<=n;i++)
      cout<<dis[i]+1<<" ";
  cout<<"\n";
 return 0;
}

Range Queries

Static Range Sum Queries 
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
void build(ll a[],ll st[],ll v,ll stl,ll str)
{
    if(stl==str)
        st[v]=a[stl];
    else
    {
        ll stm=(stl+str)/2;
        build(a,st,2*v,stl,stm);
        build(a,st,2*v+1,stm+1,str);
        st[v]=st[2*v]+st[2*v+1];
    }
    return ;
}
ll ans(ll st[],ll v,ll stl,ll str,ll l,ll r)
{
    if(l>r)
        return 0;
    if(stl==l&&str==r)
        return st[v];
    else
    {
        ll stm=(stl+str)/2;
        return ans(st,2*v,stl,stm,l,min(r,stm))+ans(st,2*v+1,stm+1,str,max(l,stm+1),r);
    }
}
int main()
{
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(NULL);
    ll n,q;
    cin>>n>>q;
    ll a[n+1];
    for(ll i=1;i<=n;i++)
        cin>>a[i];
    ll st[4*(n+1)];
    build(a,st,1,1,n);
    while(q--)
    {
        ll l,r;
        cin>>l>>r;
        cout<<ans(st,1,1,n,l,r)<<"\n";
    }
    return 0;
}

#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
void build(ll a[],ll st[],ll v,ll stl,ll str)
{
    if(stl==str)
        st[v]=a[stl];
    else
    {
        ll stm=(stl+str)/2;
        build(a,st,2*v,stl,stm);
        build(a,st,2*v+1,stm+1,str);
        st[v]=min(st[2*v],st[2*v+1]);
    }
}
ll ans(ll st[],ll v,ll stl,ll str,ll l,ll r)
{
    if(l>r)
        return INT_MAX;
    if(stl==l&&str==r)
        return st[v];
    else{
        ll stm=stl+str;
        stm/=2;
        return min(ans(st,2*v,stl,stm,l,min(r,stm)),ans(st,2*v+1,stm+1,str,max(l,stm+1),r));
    }
}

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
#define mod 1000000007
#define pb push_back
#define inf 1e18;
void checkpoint1()
{
 ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(NULL);
 /*#ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
    freopen("input.txt","r",stdin);
    freopen("output.txt","w",stdout);
  #endif
 */
}
void build(ll a[],ll st[],ll v,ll stl,ll str)
{
 if(stl==str)
   st[v]=a[str];
 else
  {
   ll stm=(str+stl)/2;
   build(a,st,2*v,stl,stm);
    build(a,st,2*v+1,stm+1,str);
    st[v]=st[2*v]+st[2*v+1];
  }
}
ll ans(ll st[],ll v,ll stl,ll str,ll l,ll r)
{
 if(l>r)
   return 0;
  if(l==stl&&r==str)
   return st[v];
 else
  {
   ll stm=stl+str;
   stm/=2;
   return ans(st,2*v,stl,stm,l,min(r,stm))+ans(st,2*v+1,stm+1,str,max(stm+1,l),r);
 }
}
void upd(ll st[],ll v,ll stl,ll str,ll pos,ll val)
{
  if(stl==str)
   st[v]=val;
  else
  {
   ll stm=(stl+str)/2;
   if(pos<=stm)
      upd(st,2*v,stl,stm,pos,val);
    else
      upd(st,2*v+1,stm+1,str,pos,val);
    st[v]=st[2*v]+st[2*v+1];
  }
}

{
  checkpoint1();

 cin>>n>>q;
  ll a[n+1],st[4*n];
  for(ll i=1;i<=n;i++)
    cin>>a[i];
  build(a,st,1,1,n);
  ll l,r;
 while(q--)
 {
   cin>>l;
   if(l==2)
   {
     cin>>l>>r;
      cout<<ans(st,1,1,n,l,r)<<"\n";
    }
   else
    {
     cin>>l>>r;
      upd(st,1,1,n,l,r);
    }
 }
 return 0;
}

#include<bits/stdc++.h>

void build(ll a[],ll st[],ll v,ll stl,ll str)

        st[v]=a[stl];
    else
    {
        ll stm=(stl+str)/2;
        build(a,st,2*v,stl,stm);
        build(a,st,2*v+1,stm+1,str);
        st[v]=min(st[2*v],st[2*v+1]);
    }
}
ll ans(ll st[],ll v,ll stl,ll str,ll l,ll r)
{
    if(l>r)
        return INT_MAX;
    if(l==stl&&r==str)
        return st[v];
    else
    {
        ll stm=(stl+str)/2;
        return min(ans(st,2*v,stl,stm,l,min(r,stm)),ans(st,2*v+1,stm+1,str,max(stm+1,l),r));
    }
}
void upd(ll st[],ll v,ll stl,ll str,ll pos,ll val)
{
    if(stl==str)
        st[v]=val;
    else
    {
        ll stm=stl+str;
        stm/=2;
        if(pos<=stm)
            upd(st,2*v,stl,stm,pos,val);
        else
            upd(st,2*v+1,stm+1,str,pos,val);
        st[v]=min(st[2*v],st[2*v+1]);
    }
}

void build(ll a[],ll st[],ll v,ll stl,ll str)
{
 if(stl==str)
   st[v]=a[str];
 else
  {
   ll stm=(str+stl)/2;
   build(a,st,2*v,stl,stm);
    build(a,st,2*v+1,stm+1,str);
    st[v]=st[2*v]^st[2*v+1];
  }
}
ll ans(ll st[],ll v,ll stl,ll str,ll l,ll r)
{

   return 0;
  if(l==stl&&r==str)
   return st[v];
 else

   stm/=2;
   return ans(st,2*v,stl,stm,l,min(r,stm))^ans(st,2*v+1,stm+1,str,max(stm+1,l),r);
 }
}

      upd(st,2*v+1,stm+1,str,pos,val);

  }
}

Subarray Sum Queries 
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
#define mod 1000000007
#define pb push_back
#define inf 1000000000000000000
void checkpoint1()
{
  ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(NULL);
 /*#ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
    freopen("input.txt","r",stdin);
    freopen("output.txt","w",stdout);
  #endif
 */
}
class data{
public:
  ll curr,pref,suff,ans;
}; 
data st[1000000];
data comb(data l,data r)
{
  data res;
 res.curr=l.curr+r.curr;
 res.pref=max(l.pref,l.curr+r.pref);
 res.suff=max(r.suff,r.curr+l.suff);
 res.ans=max(l.suff+r.pref,max(l.ans,r.ans));
  return res;
 
}
void build(ll a[],ll v,ll stl,ll str)
{
 if(stl==str)
 {
   data res;
   res.curr=res.pref=res.suff=res.ans=a[stl];
    st[v]=res;
  }
 else
  {
   ll stm=(stl+str)/2;
   build(a,2*v,stl,stm);
   build(a,2*v+1,stm+1,str);
   st[v]=comb(st[2*v],st[2*v+1]);
  }
}
void upd(ll v,ll stl,ll str,ll pos,ll val)
{
  if(stl==str)
 {
   data res;
   res.curr=res.pref=res.suff=res.ans=val;
   st[v]=res;
  }
 else
  {
   ll stm=(stl+str)/2;
   if(pos<=stm)
      upd(2*v,stl,stm,pos,val);
   else
      upd(2*v+1,stm+1,str,pos,val);
   st[v]=comb(st[2*v],st[2*v+1]);
  }
}
int main()
{
  checkpoint1();
  ll n,q;
 cin>>n>>q;
  ll a[n+1];
  for(ll i=1;i<=n;i++)
    cin>>a[i];
  build(a,1,1,n);
 while(q--)
 {
   ll pos,val;
   cin>>pos>>val;
    upd(1,1,n,pos,val);
   cout<<max(st[1].ans,0LL)<<"\n";
 }
 return 0;
}

bool comp(pair< ll,ll > &a,pair< ll,ll > &b)
{
    if(a.ff!=b.ff)
        return a.ff<b.ff;
    else
    {
        if(a.ss>b.ss)
            return b.ss<a.ss;
        else if(a.ss<b.ss)
            return a.ss<b.ss;
    }
    return a.ff>b.ff;
}
 
ll powe(ll a,ll b)
{
    ll res=1;
    while(b>0)
    {
        if(b&1)
        {
            res*=a;
            res%=mod;
        }
        a*=a;
        a%=mod;
        b>>=1;
    }
    return res;
}
vector< ll > adj[200005];
ll dis[200005];
void dfs(ll v,ll p)
{
    for(auto u:adj[v])
    {
        if(u!=p){
            dfs(u,v);
            dis[v]+=1+dis[u];
        }
    }
}

        cin>>y;
        adj[x].pb(y);
        adj[y].pb(x);
    }
    dfs(1,-1);
    for(ll i=1;i<=n;i++)
        cout<<dis[i]<<" ";
}

bool comp(const pair< pair<ll,ll>,ll > &a,const pair< pair<ll,ll>,ll > &b)
{
  if(a.ff.ff!=b.ff.ff)
   return a.ff.ff<b.ff.ff;
  if(a.ff.ss!=b.ff.ss)
   return b.ff.ss<a.ff.ss;
  else
    return a.ss>b.ss;
}
int main()
{
 checkpoint1();
  ll n,m;
 cin>>n;
 m=n-1;
  if(n==1){
    cout<<0;
    return 0;
  }
 vector< ll > adj[n+1];
  while(m--)
 {
   ll x,y;
   cin>>x>>y;
    adj[x].pb(y);
   adj[y].pb(x);
 }
 bool vis[n+1];
  ll dis[n+1];
  memset(vis,0,sizeof(vis));
  memset(dis,0,sizeof(dis));
  dis[1]=0;
 queue< ll > q;
  q.push(1);
  vis[1]=1;
 while(!q.empty())
  {
   ll v=q.front();
   q.pop();
    for(auto u:adj[v])
    {
     if(!vis[u])
      {
       vis[u]=1;
       dis[u]=dis[v]+1;
        q.push(u);
      }
   }
 }
 ll j=0,temp=0;
  for(ll i=1;i<=n;i++)
  {
   if(temp<dis[i]){
      temp=dis[i];
      j=i;
    }
 }
 memset(vis,0,sizeof(vis));
  memset(dis,0,sizeof(dis));
  vis[j]=1;dis[j]=0;
  q.push(j);
  while(!q.empty())
  {
   ll v=q.front();
   q.pop();
    for(auto u:adj[v])
    {
     if(!vis[u])
      {
       vis[u]=1;
       dis[u]=dis[v]+1;
        q.push(u);
      }
   }
 }
 j=0;temp=0;
 for(ll i=1;i<=n;i++)
  {
   if(temp<dis[i]){
      temp=dis[i];
      j=i;
    }
 }
 cout<<temp;
 return 0;
}

vector< ll > adj[200005];

{
  for(auto u:adj[v])
  {
   if(u==p)
     continue;

      dis[u]=dis[v]+1;
      dfs(u,v);
   }
 }

{
  for(auto u:adj[v])
  {
   if(u==p)
     continue;
    else{
      disr[u]=disr[v]+1;
      dfsr(u,v);
    }
 }
}

   return a.ff<b.ff;
  else
  {
   if(a.ss>b.ss)

const ll maxn=25;
vector< ll > adj[200005];
ll ways[200005][maxn];
void dfs(ll v,ll p)
{
 ways[v][0]=p;
 for(auto u:adj[v])
  {
   if(u==p)
     continue;
  // dis[u]=dis[v]+1;
   dfs(u,v);
 }
}
ll lca(ll b,ll d)
{
  while(d>0)
  {
   ll i=log2(d);
   b=ways[b][i];
   if(b==-1)
      return -1;
    d-=(1<<i);
  }
 return b;
}
int main()
{
  checkpoint1();
  memset(ways,-1,sizeof(ways));
 ll n,m;
 cin>>n>>m;
  for(ll i=2;i<=n;i++)
  {
   ll y;
   cin>>y;
   adj[i].pb(y);
   adj[y].pb(i);
 }
 dfs(1,-1);
  for(ll j=1;j<maxn;j++)
  {
   for(ll i=1;i<=n;i++)
    {
     if(ways[i][j-1]>0)
      {
       ways[i][j]=ways[ways[i][j-1]][j-1];
     }
   }
 }
 while(m--)
 {
   ll a,b;
   cin>>a>>b;
    if(b>=200000)
   {
     cout<<"-1\n";
     continue;
    }
   cout<<lca(a,b)<<"\n";
 }
 return 0;
}

#include <bits/stdc++.h>

#define inf 1000000000000000000

 cin.tie(NULL);

 /*#ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE

bool comp(pair< ll,ll > &a,pair< ll,ll > &b)
{
  if(a.ff!=b.ff)
   return a.ff<b.ff;
  else
  {
   if(a.ss>b.ss)
     return b.ss<a.ss;
    else if(a.ss<b.ss)
      return a.ss<b.ss;
  }
 return a.ff>b.ff;
}
const ll maxn=25;
vector< ll > adj[300005];
ll ways[300005][maxn];
ll dis[200005];
void dfs(ll v,ll p)
{
  ways[v][0]=p;
 for(auto u:adj[v])
  {
   if(u==p)
     continue;
    dis[u]=dis[v]+1;
    dfs(u,v);
 }
}
ll lca(ll a,ll b)
{
  if(dis[a]>dis[b])
   swap(a,b);
  ll d=dis[b]-dis[a];
 while(d>0)
  {
   ll i=log2(d);
   b=ways[b][i];
   d-=(1<<i);
  }
 if(a==b)
   return a;
 for(ll i=maxn-1;i>=0;i--)
 {
   if(ways[a][i]!=0 &&(ways[a][i]!=ways[b][i])){
     a=ways[a][i];
     b=ways[b][i];
   }
 }
 return ways[a][0];
}
int main()
{
 checkpoint1();
  memset(ways,-1,sizeof(ways));
 ll n,m;
 cin>>n>>m;
  for(ll i=2;i<=n;i++)
  {
   ll y;
   cin>>y;
   adj[i].pb(y);
   adj[y].pb(i);
 }
 dis[1]=0;
 dfs(1,-1);
  for(ll j=1;j<maxn;j++)
  {
   for(ll i=1;i<=n;i++)
    {
     if(ways[i][j-1]>0)
      {
       ways[i][j]=ways[ways[i][j-1]][j-1];
     }
   }
 }
 while(m--)
 {
   ll a,b;
   cin>>a>>b;
    cout<<lca(a,b)<<"\n";
 }
 return 0;
}
Distance Queries 
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
#define ld long double
#define mod 1000000007
#define pb push_back
#define inf 1000000000000000000
#define ff first
#define ss second
#define clear(x) memset(x,0,sizeof(x));
void checkpoint1()
{
  /******think more code less******/
  ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
 cin.tie(NULL);
  cout.tie(0);

bool comp(pair< ll,ll > &a,pair< ll,ll > &b)
{
  if(a.ff!=b.ff)
   return a.ff<b.ff;
  else
  {
   if(a.ss>b.ss)
     return b.ss<a.ss;
    else if(a.ss<b.ss)
      return a.ss<b.ss;
  }
 return a.ff>b.ff;
}
const ll maxn=25;
ll ways[200005][maxn];
vector< ll > adj[200005];
ll dis[200005];
void dfs(ll v,ll p)
{
  ways[v][0]=p;
 for(auto u:adj[v])
  {
   if(p==u)
     continue;
    dis[u]=dis[v]+1;
    dfs(u,v);
 }
}
ll lca(ll a,ll b)
{
  if(dis[a]>dis[b])
   swap(a,b);
  ll d=dis[b]-dis[a];
 while(d>0)
  {
   ll i=log2(d);
   b=ways[b][i];
   d-=(1<<i);
  }
 if(a==b)
   return a;
 for(ll i=maxn-1;i>=0;i--)
 {
   if(ways[a][i]!=0 &&(ways[a][i]!=ways[b][i])){
     a=ways[a][i];
     b=ways[b][i];
   }
 }
 return ways[a][0];
}
int main()
{
 checkpoint1();
  clear(ways);
  clear(dis);
 ll q,n,m;
 cin>>n>>q;
  m=n-1;
  while(m--)
 {
   ll x,y;
   cin>>x>>y;
    adj[x].pb(y);
   adj[y].pb(x);
 }
 dis[1]=0;
 dfs(1,0);
 for(ll j=1;j<maxn;j++)
  {
   for(ll i=1;i<=n;i++)
    {
     if(ways[i][j-1]!=0)
      {
       ways[i][j]=ways[ways[i][j-1]][j-1];
     }
   }
 }
 while(q--)
 {
   ll a,b;
   cin>>a>>b;
    ll lc=lca(a,b);
   ll ans=dis[a]+dis[b]-dis[lc]-dis[lc];
   cout<<ans<<"\n";
  }
 return 0;
}

#pragma GCC optimization ("unroll-loops")
#include <bits/stdc++.h>

#define ld long double

#define ss second

#define all(x) (x).begin(),(x).end()
void checkpoint1()
{

  ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
 cin.tie(NULL);
  cout.tie(NULL);
 /*#ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE

bool comp(pair< ll,ll > &a,pair< ll,ll > &b)
{
  if(a.ff!=b.ff)
   return a.ff<b.ff;
  else
  {
   if(a.ss>b.ss)
     return b.ss<a.ss;
    else if(a.ss<b.ss)
      return a.ss<b.ss;
  }
 return a.ff>b.ff;
}
ll powe(ll a,ll b)
{
  ll res=1;
 while(b>0)
  {
   if(b&1)
    {
     res*=a;
     res%=mod;
   }
   a*=a;
   a%=mod;
   b>>=1;
  }
 return res;
}
const ll maxn=20;
vector< ll > adj[200005];
ll dis[200005],store[200005];
ll ways[200005][maxn];
void dfs(ll v,ll p)
{
 ways[v][0]=p;
 for(auto u:adj[v])
  {
   if(u==p)
     continue;
    dis[u]=1+dis[v];
    dfs(u,v);
 }
}
ll lca(ll a,ll b)
{
  if(dis[a]>dis[b])
   swap(a,b);
  ll d=dis[b]-dis[a];
 while(d>0)
  {
   ll i=log2(d);
   b=ways[b][i];
   d-=(1<<i);
  }
 if(a==b)
   return a;
 for(ll i=maxn-1;i>=0;i--)
 {
   if(ways[a][i]!=-1&&ways[a][i]!=ways[b][i])
   {
     a=ways[a][i];
     b=ways[b][i];
   }
 }
 return ways[a][0];
}
void dfs1(ll v,ll p)
{
 for(auto u:adj[v])
  {
   if(u==p)
     continue;
    dfs1(u,v);
    store[v]+=store[u];
 }
}
int main()
{
  checkpoint1();
  memset(ways,-1,sizeof(ways));
 Clear(store);
  ll n,q;
 cin>>n>>q;
  for(ll i=1;i<n;i++)
 {
   ll x,y;
   cin>>x>>y;
    adj[x].pb(y);
   adj[y].pb(x);
 }
 dis[1]=0;
 dfs(1,-1);
  for(ll j=1;j<maxn;j++)
  {
   for(ll i=1;i<=n;i++)
    {
     if(ways[i][j-1]!=-1)
       ways[i][j]=ways[ways[i][j-1]][j-1];
   }
 }
 while(q--)
 {
   ll x,y;
   cin>>x>>y;
    store[x]++;
   store[y]++;
   ll tatti=lca(x,y);
    store[tatti]--;
   if(ways[tatti][0]!=-1)
     store[ways[tatti][0]]--;
  }
 dfs1(1,-1);
 for(ll i=1;i<=n;i++)
    cout<<store[i]<<" ";
  return 0;
}
Subtree Queries 
//#pragma GCC optimize("Ofast")

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
 
#define ll long long
#define ld long double
#define mod 1000000007
#define pb push_back
#define inf 1000000000000000000
#define ff first
#define ss second
#define deb(x) cout<<#x<<" "<<x<<"\n"
#define Clear(x) memset(x,0,sizeof(x))
#define all(x) (x).begin(),(x).end()
 
void checkpoint1()
{

  ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);

bool comp(pair< ll,ll > &a,pair< ll,ll > &b)
{
 if(a.ff!=b.ff)
   return a.ff<b.ff;
  else
  {
   if(a.ss>b.ss)
     return b.ss<a.ss;
    else if(a.ss<b.ss)
      return a.ss<b.ss;
  }
 return a.ff>b.ff;
}
 
ll powe(ll a,ll b)
{
 ll res=1;
 while(b>0)
  {
   if(b&1)
    {
     res*=a;
     res%=mod;
   }
   a*=a;
   a%=mod;
   b>>=1;
  }
 return res;
}
ll tin[200005],tout[200005];
vector< ll > adj[200005];
bool vis[200005];
ll timer=0;
void dfs(ll v)
{
  timer++;
  vis[v]=1;
 tin[v]=timer;
 for(auto u:adj[v])
  {
   if(!vis[u])
      dfs(u);
 }
 tout[v]=timer;
}
void build(ll st[],ll a[],ll v,ll stl,ll str)
{
  if(stl==str)
 {
   st[v]=a[stl];
 }
 else
  {
   ll stm=stl+str;
   stm/=2;
   build(st,a,2*v,stl,stm);
    build(st,a,2*v+1,stm+1,str);
    st[v]=st[2*v]+st[2*v+1];
  }
}
void upd(ll st[],ll v,ll stl,ll str,ll pos,ll val)
{
  if(stl==str)
   st[v]=val;
  else
  {
   ll stm=(stl+str)/2;
   if(pos<=stm)
      upd(st,2*v,stl,stm,pos,val);
    else
      upd(st,2*v+1,stm+1,str,pos,val);
    st[v]=st[2*v]+st[2*v+1];
  }
}
ll ans(ll st[],ll v,ll stl,ll str,ll l,ll r)
{
 if(l>r)
   return 0LL;
  if(stl==l && r==str)
   return st[v];
 else
  {
   ll stm=(stl+str)/2;
   return ans(st,2*v,stl,stm,l,min(r,stm))+ans(st,2*v+1,stm+1,str,max(l,stm+1),r);
 }
}
void terminAtor()
{
 ll n,q;
 cin>>n>>q;
  ll A[n+1];
  for(ll i=1;i<=n;i++)
    cin>>A[i];
  for(ll i=1;i<n;i++)
 {
   ll x,y;
   cin>>x>>y;
    adj[x].pb(y);
   adj[y].pb(x);
 }
 dfs(1);
 ll a[n+1];
  for(ll i=1;i<=n;i++)
    a[tin[i]]=A[i];
 ll st[4*n];
 build(st,a,1,1,n);
  while(q--)
 {
   ll l,r;
   cin>>l;
   if(l==1)
   {
     cin>>l>>r;
      upd(st,1,1,n,tin[l],r);
   }
   else{
      cin>>l;
     cout<<ans(st,1,1,n,tin[l],tout[l])<<"\n";
   }
 }
}
